name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 030
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, While I Change Clothes, is a special color changing edition of Please Stand By in celebration of our 30th release! Because sometimes one color combination isn't right for all occasions.
